revised_title: Erratum: Studies on Hexactinellid Sponges - Correcting Figure 6
tldr: This article is an erratum for a previous study on hexactinellid sponges. It corrects a problem with figure 6 in the original publication due to poor reproduction of the drawing. The article also provides information on the distribution of various algae in the Castle Narrows in September 1979.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
